HTMLTableCellElementRowSpan.summary: The rowSpan read-only property of the interface represents the number of rows this cell must span; this lets the cell occupy space across multiple rows of the table. It reflects the rowspan attribute.
HTMLTableCellElementRowSpan.value: A positive number representing the number of rows. If it is 0, it means all remaining rows in the column.When setting a new value, a value different from 0 is clamped to the nearest strictly positive number.
